lab: Project and System Engineering and Management - I
lab_display_name: Project and System Engineering and Management - I
introduction:
Welcome to the Project and System Engineering and Management - I developed at COEPTECH. This lab deals with the administrative and design part of the project. In the administrative part, the suitable organisational structure required for a typical type of project execution will be dealt with. The design part comprises energy and material balance, P & I diagram, workflows, and aligned design strategies
The execution part mainly comprises floating the inquiries, preparing the comparative statements, identifying the right vendors and finally completing the project successfully. While commissioning a plant, a well-defined strategy needs to be developed for the factory acceptance test, the Site acceptance test, and the Commissioning acceptance test. The entire experience that will be gained through this laboratory is worth pitching the student to any consulting firm for their professional life. The working models of the pilot plant are derived from the actual running plants, which ensures the correct version of simulating a plant.

experiments.name: Design and develop a P&ID for Spray drying pilot plant
Design and develop a P&ID for Boiler and Heat Exchanger pilot plant
Design and develop a P&ID for Batch and Bottle Filling pilot plant
Design and develop a P&ID for Binary Batch Distillation Column pilot plant
To study and prepare Process Flow Diagram
Develop documents for SOW/WBS/Organization structure for any I & C Project
Interpret the Energy Balance sheet and Material Balance sheet
Develop activity charts for process and instrumentation project
To prepare documents for Procurement activities: Inquiry, Quotation, Comparative statement, Purchase orders for a typical project
Create documents for tests like FAT/SAT or CAT
Prepare and validate the commissioning documents
Prepare the cost estimation sheet for the project under consideration

UG: UG (3rd Year) 6th Semester, UG (4th Year), 7th Semester

objective:
• Understand various sensors and their installation and calibration requirements
  • Develop various documents required to complete the project
  • Identify the importance of documents and their interrelations
  • Develop the skill of working in a team to complete the project within specified limits
  • Apply national and international standards and recommended practices

courseAlignment.description: The syllabi of this lab aligns to the following universities in India.
universities: Savitribai Phule Pune University, Pune, Maharashtra
Sant Gadge Baba Amravati University, Amravati, Maharashtra
Kavyitri Bahinabai North Maharashtra University, Jalgaon, Maharashtra
